description:
Luffy, through sheer force of will, can almost use his Haki to battle Katakuri! Meanwhile, the Sunny catches fire while the Straw Hats try to kick out Big Mom but that’s when Jimbei steps up to the plate and takes a swing at her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !أخيرًا تحدث المواجهة! اليونكو ضد طاقم قبّعة القشّ
Eine direkte Konfrontation – Die Kaiserin gegen die Strohhüte!
Finally, They Clash! The Emperor of the Sea vs. the Straw Hats!
Ils s`affrontent enfin. La Yonkou contre l`équipage des Mugiwara
Lo scontro! L`Imperatrice del mare contro la ciurma di Cappello di paglia
Tsui ni Gekitotsu: Yonkou tai Mugiwara no Ichimi
¡El contraataque de Luffy! ¡El poder del Snakeman!
遂に激突 四皇VS[たい]麦わらの一味
